bibl.title: Bones of the Prophet and Birds in the City: Stories of the Foundation of Alexandria in Ancient and Medieval Jewish Sources.
Alexander the Great and Egypt. History, Art, Tradition. Wrocław / Breslau, 18. / 19. Nov. 2011.

bibl.note: Introduction. - Sources. - The Jewish Greek literature and the Alexandria narrative. - The Rabbinic narrative on the bones of Jeremiah and the story in the Romance.
bibl.seg: Aleksandra Klęczar, Bones of the Prophet and Birds in the City: Stories of the Foundation of Alexandria in Ancient and Medieval Jewish Sources.

Volker Grieb, Krzysztof Nawotka & Agnieszka Wojciechowska (edd.), Alexander the Great and Egypt. History, Art, Tradition. Wrocław / Breslau, 18. / 19. Nov. 2011 = Philippika. Altertumskundliche Abhandlungen. 74 (Wiesbaden, 2014) pp. 391-400.
Introduction. - Sources. - The Jewish Greek literature and the Alexandria narrative. - The Rabbinic narrative on the bones of Jeremiah and the story in the Romance.
